summary: An easy wizard to configure hard-coded keys for game Skyrim version 1.2.
descriptionHtml:
An easy wizard to configure hard-coded keys for game Skyrim.

 If a custom keys configuration is already present on pc
 it will be lost and replaced with a new one.

 A configuration created with this tool will be mantained.

 You can set the following keys :
 - Items
	Zoom Item
 - Map
	Local Map
	Player Position
 - Various
	Hot Keys 1-8
	Take Screenshot
	Open Console

 All the remaining keys (except those configured in game) will be setted to default values.

 When you finish this wizard two files will be created :
 - controlmap.txt
 	Located in ...\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\Interface\\controls\\pc
	is the Skyrim file for keys configuration

 	If Steam installation path is not found configuration file
     	will be created where SkyrimAdvancedKeyMapper.exe has been executed

 - LastConfiguration.cfg
	Located where SkyrimAdvancedKeyMapper.exe has been executed
	is a data file this utility use to reload configured keys

 To remove key configuration delete \\controls\\pc path or controlmap.txt file

 Utility created by Mursey - Nov-Dec 2011
author: Mursey

files.name: SkyrimAdvancedKeyMapper
files.changelogHtml:
\'Zoom Item\' key added
\'Player Position\' key added
